duties_responsibilities.duty: Research, develop, design, and test electrical components, equipment, and systems.
Configure, program, and troubleshoot SIMATIC controllers S7-1200, S7-1500, S7-300, and S7-400.
Configure, program, and troubleshoot Siemens HMI’s using Simatic WinCC flexible/classic.
Configure, program, and troubleshoot Siemens Variable Frequency Drives using Siemens Starter drives commissioning tool.
Configure, program, and troubleshoot IBA PDA Analyzer system.
Review and comprehend project instructions, manuals, and blueprints to ascertain specifications, procedures, objectives, nature of technical problem, and possible solutions.
Maintain professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks.
Ensure projects meet electrical and construction safety regulations.
Assist maintenance in troubleshooting, repairs, and training; provide engineering information by answering questions and requests.
Be on call status when needed during times of emergencies or adverse conditions.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree or equivalent from a four-year college or technical school, or three years of related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
